welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alton, where charming historic architecture meets breathtaking river views. Known for its rich history and picturesque downtown, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport houses the majority of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and various shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport mainly serves low-cost carriers and features a smaller selection of amenities compared to the main terminal.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights, offering exclusive lounges and services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport serves as a hub for shipping and receiving goods, with state-of-the-art facilities and equipment.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
